sentences.en: Bill gestured with the drumstick in one hand and the bottle of wine in the other.
sentences.cn: 比尔一手拿着鸡腿,一手拿着酒瓶,打着手势.

sentences.en: Drumstick price is first - rate recently, these chicken that have 3 legs are my improved new breed!
sentences.cn: 最近鸡腿价格非常好, 这些有三条腿的鸡都是我改良的新品种!

sentences.en: He fall asleep clutch a half - eat drumstick in his right fist.
sentences.cn: 他右手里紧握著一根吃了一半的鸡腿睡著了.

sentences.en: He fell asleep clutching a half - eaten drumstick in his right fist.
sentences.cn: 他右手里紧握着一只吃了一半的鸡腿睡着了.

sentences.en: Mix lime juice with ground drumstick pods and leaves.
sentences.cn: 混合石灰汁与地面鼓槌吊舱和叶片.

sentences.en: She offered Molly tidbits: a chicken drumstick, some cheese.
sentences.cn: 她给了莫莉一些吃的：一根鸡腿下段和一些奶酪。

sentences.en: The youngster examines minutely curiously: The flavour of that drumstick how?
sentences.cn: 年青人好奇地追问道: 那鸡腿的味道怎么样?

sentences.en: Wash drumstick, drain. Add seasoning to marinate for 15 to 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 先将鸡槌洗净沥乾, 然后加入调味料腌约15至20分钟.

sentences.en: We'll take a fillet steak and roasted chicken drumstick.
sentences.cn: 我们要菲利牛排和一份烤鸡腿.

trans.tran_cn: 鼓槌，鼓槌（形物）体（如鸡腿等）
trans.tran_en: a stick that you use to hit a drum
